member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions
member.summary: Options for the Twitter authentication middleware.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions.ConsumerKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the consumer key used to communicate with Twitter.
member.value: The consumer key used to communicate with Twitter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions.ConsumerSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the consumer secret used to sign requests to Twitter.
member.value: The consumer secret used to sign requests to Twitter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets timeout value in milliseconds for back channel communications with Twitter.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelCertificateValidator
member.summary: Gets or sets the a pinned certificate validator to use to validate the endpoints used in back channel communications belong to Twitter.
member.remarks: If this property is null then the default certificate checks are performed, validating the subject name and if the signing chain is a trusted party.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions.BackchannelHttpHandler
member.summary: The HttpMessageHandler used to communicate with Twitter. This cannot be set at the same time as BackchannelCertificateValidator unless the value can be downcast to a WebRequestHandler.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions.Caption
member.summary: Get or sets the text that the user can display on a sign in user interface.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions.CallbackPath
member.summary: The request path within the application's base path where the user-agent will be returned. The middleware will process this request when it arrives. Default value is "/signin-twitter".

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions.SignInAsAuthenticationType
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of another authentication middleware which will be responsible for actually issuing a user .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions.StateDataFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets the type used to secure data handled by the middleware.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Security.Twitter.TwitterAuthenticationOptions.Provider
member.summary: Gets or sets the used to handle authentication events.
